channel.title: Baby Name Announcement on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content about iOS development with Swift in Baby Name Announcement from Andrew Bancroft.

item.title: Announcing the Birth of……
item.description:
My daughter, whom we codenamed Firefly, made her debut at 2:59 AM this morning! Being the nerd that I am, I built a small iOS app to reveal her name.

Introducing….
